Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone, I'm having a hard time playing this game and getting into orbit and stuff, and Ive herd and seen people using this "unlimited flue" option, I'm on a mac, and Ive seen topic's like this before and people saying press Alt+F12, well, that doesn't work for me, it just opens up system preferences. without pressing alt at the same time, its the volume button, Can anyone help me?

Thanks ^^
Hi @IPlayGames360, please see here.
I think you have to use the command button, it's the one that is really circley and stuff, as well as the F12 button.

Under MacOS, you need to press "Fn" to use the F1-F12 keys.

Or you do as I do, go into System Preferences > Keyboard and check the box which says "Use all F1, F2 keys as standard function keys". Then press Fn when you want to change volume, brightness or whatever.

IMO, that should be the default setting on a Mac.

Be aware, though, that Alt-F1 might still never do what you actually want it to. Luckily KSP doesn't use that combination.
Thank you all for you help. I'm about to try and see if it works.
Thanks you soo much, it worked!
